course_title: Modern Magics: Spanish-American Literature and Culture since the 1820s

sections.comments: Literary engagements with modernity in the Spanish Americas, from the 1820's to the present. Includes civilization, progress, politicization, and violence. Full description: https://fhis.ubc.ca/course-description/span365/

description: Literary engagements with modernity in the Spanish Americas, from the 1820's to the present. Includes civilization, progress, politicization, and violence.
